boundless.ejb

Class InviteBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • boundless.ejb.InviteBean

  • public class InviteBean
extends java.lang.Object
    Single gateway through which all invitation operations pass through

        Parameters:

        league - : The league the invitation is to
        accept - : Whether an invitaiton is accepted or rejected

                     League league)
        Cancels an invitation that was sent via email which has not been responded to
        Parameters:
        sender - : The user who sent the invitation.
        email - : The email to which the invitaion was sent.
        league - : The league to which the email address owner was invited

        Parameters:
        sender - : The user who sent the invitation
        invitee - : The invited user
        league - : The league to which they were invited

        email - : The email to send it to
        league - : The league to invite the email address to

        Parameters:

        invitee - : The user who is invited
        league - : The league they are invited to
